item.description:
@jme wrote:

goatee:

Could someone explain to me what a neopets refresher does/is useful for?

In neopets you get random events sometimes. So with it loading pages rapidly you get many of these events, and get items worth a lot of money.

item.title: Neopets Refresher
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

3 times because there isnt many links and i guess because its always in same order. Once i hit 100 links in mine ill release. So far so good. And jme iunno. Everythign was fine but just like jagex. Neopets have to screw it so that you dont get as many randoms anymore i dont think. I dunno about icing. We shall just have to see.

Progress report from my latest refresher in scar

Refreshed 26 Times
Last Refreshed Page Neopets - Shops and Auctions

EDIT:
Well either im doing something wrong or they dont give out randoms as much :p. Or maybe it was using internet explorer as my default browser.

In anycase. Seems like mine is wokring well. A few more links and ill post

Refreshed 1754 Times
Last Refreshed Page Neopets - Flash Games and More!

Read full topic

item.title: Neopets Refresher
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

How come you can only use it 3 times?

Btw, I thought the auto refreshers were obsolete because I’d get banned everytime using them. I made 70 dollars one summer from just a week or so of using the refreshers, then later on they seemed to just get iced almost right away.

Read full topic

item.title: Neopets Refresher
item.dc:creator: @uncfan1119 uncfan1119
item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

Im working on one… So far I’ve gotten [scar]{_ _ _
| | | | |
| | | ___ ___ _ __ | | ___
| . ` |/ _ / _ | ’ / _ __/ __|
| | | __/ () | |) | __/ |__
_| _/_|_/| ./ _|_|_/
| |
|| by uncfan1119
{ONLY USE THIS SCRIPT 3 TIMES! I’m not liable for you getting iced!}{
| ___ / | | |
| |/ /| | _ __ ___ | | ___ _ __
| // _ _| '/ _ / | ’ / _ '|
| | __/ | | | | _/_ | | | / |
_| __|| || _||/| ||_|| }

{=========================================================================]
[ ]
[ ]
[ NAME : Uncfan1119’s Neopets Refresher. ]
[ WRITER : Uncfan1119 ]
[ CATEGORY : Neopets ]
[ DESCRIPTION : Use this script only 3 times or your acct is iced]
[ USAGE : For any kind of collecting script. ]
[ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ]
[ NOTES : Don’t leech! Report bugs on moparisthebest.com! ]
[ CONTACT : Wuncfan1119@hotmail.com ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Uncfan1119’s Neopets Refresher ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. Start Logged onto neopets. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3.Start with atleast 5k NP! ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================}
program Uncfan1119sNeopetsRefresher;

{======================FoodShop Procedure================}
Procedure FoodShop; // A Procedure to refresh the food shop.
Begin
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml’);
Wait(5100+ Random (32));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=1’);
Wait(5500+ Random(210));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=1’);
Wait(6212+ Random (316));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=1’);
Wait(8541+ Random (421));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=1’) ;
Wait(4254+ Random (844));
End;
{=====================End FoodShop Procedure===========}

{======================BookShop Procedure================}
Procedure BookShop; // A Procedure to refresh the book shop.
Begin
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml’);
Wait(6100+ Random (312));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=7’);
Wait(5412+ Random (515));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=7’);
Wait(4322+ Random (513));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=7’);
Wait(12121+ Random (12));
End;
{=====================End BookShop Procedure===========}
{======================FairyLand! Procedure================}
Procedure FairyLand; // A Procedure to refresh the farieland urls.
Begin
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/index.phtml’);
Wait(6180+ Random (812));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/springs.phtml’);
Wait(6843+ Random (483));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/index.phtml’);
Wait(4822+ Random (482));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/faeriecity.phtml’);
Wait(6943+ Random (483));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/hiddentower938.phtml’);
Wait(5432+ Random (2190));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/faeriecity.phtml’);
Wait(5321+ Random (123));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/brushes.phtml’);
Wait(8128 + Random (284));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/faeriecity.phtml’);
Wait(6621+ Random (423));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=75’);
Wait(7832+ Random(1));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=75’);
Wait(8838+ Random(438));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/faerieland/faeriecity.phtml’);
Wait(8483+ Random (483));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=93’);
Wait(6932+ Random (483));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/objects.phtml?type=shop&obj_type=93’);
Wait(4832+ Random (4183));
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.neopets.com/explore.phtml’);
Wait(12482+ Random (212));
{=====================End FairyLand! Procedure===========}
end;

{~~~MAIN LOOP~}
begin
FoodShop;
BookShop;
FairyLand;

{END MAIN LOOP~~~~~}
end.[/scar]
